mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , N.INQUIRY , TO_CHAR (N.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , A.ADMIN_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON A.ADMIN_NO = N.ADMIN_NO WHERE N.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT N.NOTICE_NO , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , N.INQUIRY , TO_CHAR (N.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , A.ADMIN_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON A.ADMIN_NO = N.ADMIN_NO WHERE N.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT , N.NOTICE_NO , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , N.INQUIRY , TO_CHAR (N.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , A.ADMIN_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON A.ADMIN_NO = N.ADMIN_NO WHERE N.DEL_YN = 'N' AND N.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET INQUIRY = INQUIRY+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
